intro: Step into the world of high-stakes burglary in Thief Simulator Mastermind Edition - the ultimate version of the hit stealth sandbox! Now bigger, smarter, and packed with new heists.
description:
Plan your every move and pull off daring thefts across five fully explorable districts, from upscale suburbs to the newly added Agricultural District, where barns hide more than just haystacks. Mansions, safes, luxury cars, and high-end tech - if you can see it, you can steal it!

This enhanced edition nearly doubles the content of the original game and includes the integrated Luxury Houses DLC, bringing new depth and challenge to your criminal career.

New Features & Content:

• Luxury Houses DLC included:
- 4 extravagant new homes with unique architecture and advanced security

• Two new massive maps

• Overhauled and expanded sandbox world - now featuring 5 total districts

• 4 powerful new tools:
- Deciphering Device
- Under-Door Camera
- Keycard Duplicator
- Universal Window Remote

• 3 brand-new luxury vehicles to steal

• New heist missions and loot types

Key Features:
• Explore open-world neighborhoods full of opportunities (and risks)
• Scout your targets, study routines, and plan the perfect break-in
• Buy high-tech burglary tools and develop your thief skills
• Fence your stolen goods on the black market or at the pawn shop
• Take on high-level contracts and side missions with valuable rewards
• Visit new locations like the farm estate and Sunvalley St., where homes introduce fresh tactical challenges.
